title: I’m Sorry Guy Fieri, Viral Loads 5.13.20
itunes:title: I’m Sorry Guy Fieri, Viral Loads 5.13.20
description:
In episode 629, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by Smart Mouth's Katherine Spiers to discuss the viral load of coronavirus, Trump ignoring coronavirus polls, haters preferring Biden, how a second wave of coronavirus cases could fuel more economic depression, pandemics changing us forever, the Guy Fieri renaissance, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Risks - Know Them - Avoid Them
  2. Two big warning signs for Trump in the new coronavirus poll — signs he doesn’t seem to want to see
  3. Many governors win bipartisan support for handling of pandemic, but some Republicans face blowback over reopening efforts
  4. Trump is getting trounced among a crucial constituency: The haters
  5. A 2nd wave of US virus cases will plunge the economy into a depression, Moody's economist says
  6. Pandemics Leave Us Forever Altered
  7. We’ll say it again: Guy Fieri is good
  8. WATCH: Zero 7 - Somersault (Official Video) ft. Sia

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
